EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, BLUE HULL, 200 PERSONS ON BOARD, ADRIFT
IN VICINITY 33-23.00N 018-42.00E AT 112215Z NOV.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
2182 1717 3377, 2182 1444 9488,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
E-MAIL: LCG.OPS.RM@MOD.GOV.LY,
LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY, LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY
OR MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
